name: com.esotericsoftware.spine.timeline
description:
This plugin provides integration of spine-unity for the Unity Timeline.

Prerequisites:
It requires a working installation of the spine-unity and spine-csharp runtimes as UPM packages (not as spine-unity unitypackage), version 4.1.
(See http://esotericsoftware.com/git/spine-runtimes/spine-unity)
